00011 /**
00012  * a universal caching class that can store data using several methods
00013  * @package kata_utility
00014  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00015  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00016  * @author jo@wurzelpilz.de
00017  */

00020     /**
00021      * which store/read-method to use

00026     protected $defaultMethod = null;

00031     /**
00032      * some internal constants
00033      */
00034     const CM_FILE = 'file';
00035     const CM_EACC = 'eacc'; //eaccelerator (please use apc)
00036     const CM_APC = 'apc';
00037     const CM_XCACHE = 'xcache';
00038     const CM_MEMCACHED = 'memcached'; //yeah. with a d
00039     const CM_MEMCACHE = 'memcache'; //without a d
00040 
00041     protected $isInitialized = false;
00042     /**
00043      * set first store/read-method as default
00044      */
00045     function initialize() {
00046         if ($this->isInitialized) {
00047             return;
00048         }
00049         $this->results = array ();
00050         kataMakeTmpPath('cache');
00051 
00052         if (defined('CACHE_USEMETHOD')) {
00053             $this->method = CACHE_USEMETHOD;
00054             $this->defaultMethod = CACHE_USEMETHOD;
00055             $this->isInitialized = true;
00056             return;
00057         }
00058 
00059         if (defined('MEMCACHED_SERVERS') && ('' != MEMCACHED_SERVERS) && class_exists('Memcached')) {
00060             $this->method = self :: CM_MEMCACHED;
00061             $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_MEMCACHED;
00062             $this->initMemcached(true);
00063             $this->isInitialized = true;
00064             return;
00065         }
00066         if (defined('MEMCACHED_SERVERS') && ('' != MEMCACHED_SERVERS) && class_exists('Memcache')) {
00067             $this->method = self :: CM_MEMCACHE;
00068             $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_MEMCACHE;
00069             $this->initMemcached();
00070             $this->isInitialized = true;
00071             return;
00072         }
00073         if (function_exists('apc_fetch')) {
00074             if (((CLI!=1) && ini_get('apc.enabled')) || ((CLI==1) && ini_get('apc.enable_cli'))) {
00075                 $this->method = self :: CM_APC;
00076                 $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_APC;
00077                 $this->isInitialized = true;
00078                 return;
00079             }
00080         }
00081         if (function_exists('xcache_get')) {
00082             $this->method = self :: CM_XCACHE;
00083             $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_XCACHE;
00084             $this->isInitialized = true;
00085             return;
00086         }
00087         if (function_exists('eaccelerator_get') && ini_get('eaccelerator.enable')) {
00088             $this->method = self :: CM_EACC;
00089             $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_EACC;
00090             $this->isInitialized = true;
00091             return;
00092         }
00093 
00094         $this->method = self :: CM_FILE;
00095         $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_FILE;
00096         $this->isInitialized = true;
00097     }
00098 
00099     /**
00100      * @return int caching-method used for the last read/write
00101      */
00102     function getMethodUsed() {
00103         return $this->method;
00104     }

00106     protected $memcachedClass = null;
00107     
00108     /**
00109      * add all memcache-servers we know about, or just return if we already did it.
00110      * uses all servers defined in MEMCACHED_SERVERS, see core.php
00111      */
00112     protected function initMemcached($withD = false) {
00113         if (null !== $this->memcachedClass) {
00114             return;
00115         }
00116 
00117         if ($withD) {
00118             $this->memcachedClass = new Memcached;
00119         } else {
00120             ini_set('memcache.allow_failover', true);
00121             ini_set('memcache.hash_strategy', 'consistent');
00122             ini_set('memcache.hash_function', 'fnv');
00123             $this->memcachedClass = new Memcache;
00124         }
00125 
00126         $servers = explode(',', MEMCACHED_SERVERS);
00127         foreach ($servers as $server) {
00128             $temp = explode(':', $server);
00129             $this->memcachedClass->addServer($temp[0], empty ($temp[1]) ? 11211 : $temp[1], 1);
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133     function getMemcacheStats() {
00134         $this->initialize();
00135 
00136         if (is_a($this->memcachedClass,'Memcache')) {
00137             return $this->memcachedClass->getExtendedStats();
00138         }
00139         if (is_a($this->memcachedClass,'Memcached')) {
00140             return $this->memcachedClass->getStats();
00141         }
00142 
00143         return array();
00144     }

00152     /**
00153      * output debugging data if needed
00154      */
00155     function __destruct() {
00156         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00157             array_unshift($this->results , array (
00158                     'line',
00159                     'op',
00160                     'id',
00161                     'data',
00162                     'time'
00163             ));
00164             kataDebugOutput($this->results, true);
00165         }
00166         unset($this->requestCache);
00167     }
00168 
00169     function add($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00170         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00171             $this->results[] = array (
00172                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00173                     'add',
00174                     $id,
00175                     '*caching off*',
00176                     0
00177             );
00178             return false;
00179         }
00180         $startTime = microtime(true);
00181         $this->initialize();
00182         $r = $this->_add($id, $data, $ttl, $forceMethod);
00183 
00184         if ($r && $this->useRequestCache) {
00185             $this->requestCache[$id] = $data;
00186         }
00187 
00188         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00189             $this->results[] = array (
00190                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00191                     'add',
00192                     $id,
00193                     kataFunc::getValueInfo($data),
00194                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00195             );
00196         }
00197         return $r;
00198     }
00199 
00200     function write($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00201         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00202             $this->results[] = array (
00203                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00204                     'write',
00205                     $id,
00206                     '*caching off*',
00207                     0
00208             );
00209             return false;
00210         }
00211         $startTime = microtime(true);
00212         $this->initialize();
00213         $r = $this->_write($id, $data, $ttl, $forceMethod);
00214 
00215         if ($r && $this->useRequestCache) {
00216             $this->requestCache[$id] = $data;
00217         }
00218 
00219         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00220             $this->results[] = array (
00221                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00222                     'write',
00223                     $id,
00224                     kataFunc::getValueInfo($data),
00225                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00226             );
00227         }
00228         return $r;
00229     }
00230 
00231     function read($id, $forceMethod = false) {
00232         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00233             $this->results[] = array (
00234                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00235                     'read',
00236                     $id,
00237                     '*caching off*',
00238                     0
00239             );
00240             return false;
00241         }
00242 
00243         if ($this->useRequestCache && isset($this->requestCache[$id])) {
00244             $data = $this->requestCache[$id];
00245             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00246                 $this->results[] = array (
00247                         kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00248                         'reqCache',
00249                         $id,
00250                         kataFunc::getValueInfo($data),
00251                         0
00252                 );
00253             }
00254             return $data;
00255         }
00256 
00257         $startTime = microtime(true);
00258         $this->initialize();
00259         $data = $this->_read($id, $forceMethod);
00260         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00261             $this->results[] = array (
00262                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00263                     'read',
00264                     $id,
00265                     kataFunc::getValueInfo($data),
00266                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00267             );
00268         }
00269 
00270         if ($this->useRequestCache) {
00271             $this->requestCache[$id] = $data;
00272         }
00273 
00274         return $data;
00275     }

00280     public function disableRequestCache() {
00281         $this->useRequestCache = false;
00282     }

00285      * Enables the request cache

00287     public function enableRequestCache() {
00288         $this->useRequestCache = true;

00291     /**
00292      * @var float|null
00293      */
00294     protected $casToken=null;
00295 
00296     /**
00297      * Read data from the cache
00298      *
00299      * @param string $id an unique-id of the data you want to read
00300      * @param int $forceMethod which caching-method to use (only this time)
00301      * @return mixed returns array or false if data could not be read
00302      */
00303     protected function _read($id, $forceMethod = false) {
00304         $false = false;
00305         $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00306 
00307         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00308             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00309         } else {
00310             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00311         }
00312 
00313         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00314             $this->initMemcached(true);
00315             return $this->memcachedClass->get($id,null,$this->casToken);
00316         }
00317 
00318         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00319             $this->initMemcached();
00320             return $this->memcachedClass->get($id);
00321         }
00322 
00323         if (self :: CM_APC == $this->method) {
00324             return apc_fetch($id);
00325         }
00326 
00327         if (self :: CM_XCACHE == $this->method) {
00328             if (xcache_isset($id)) {
00329                 return xcache_get($id);
00330             }
00331             return false;
00332         }
00333 
00334         if (self :: CM_EACC == $this->method) {
00335             $data = eaccelerator_get($id);
00336             if (null === $data) {
00337                 return $false;
00338             }
00339             return @unserialize($data);
00340         }
00341 
00342         if (self :: CM_FILE == $this->method) {
00343             $fname = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . urlencode($id);
00344             if (file_exists($fname)) {
00345                 $temp = file_get_contents($fname);
00346                 if ($temp !== false) {
00347                     $temp = unserialize($temp);
00348                     if ((0 == $temp['ttl']) || ($temp['ttl'] > time())) {
00349                         return $temp['data'];
00350                     }
00351                 }
00352             }
00353             return $false;
00354         }
00355 
00356         throw new Exception('cacheUtil: unknown cache-method used');
00357     }
00358 
00359     /**
00360      * write data to the cache. if data is false, the item will be purged from cache
00361      *
00362      * @param string $id  an unique-id of the data you want to write
00363      * @param mixed $data data to write
00364      * @param int $ttl time to live in seconds
00365      * @param int $forceMethod which caching method to use (only this time)
00366      * @return boolean true on success
00367      */
00368     protected function _write($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00369         $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00370 
00371         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00372             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00373         } else {
00374             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00375         }
00376 
00377         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00378             $this->initMemcached(true);
00379             if (false === $data) {
00380                 return $this->memcachedClass->delete($id);
00381             }
00382             return $this->memcachedClass->set($id, $data, $ttl);
00383         }
00384 
00385         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00386             $this->initMemcached();
00387             if (false === $data) {
00388                 return $this->memcachedClass->delete($id);
00389             }
00390             return $this->memcachedClass->set($id, $data, false, $ttl);
00391         }
00392 
00393         if (self :: CM_APC == $this->method) {
00394             if (false === $data) {
00395                 return apc_delete($id);
00396             }
00397             return apc_store($id, $data, $ttl);
00398         }
00399 
00400         if (self :: CM_XCACHE == $this->method) {
00401             if (false === $data) {
00402                 return xcache_unset($id);
00403             }
00404             return xcache_set($id, $data, $ttl);
00405         }
00406 
00407         if (self :: CM_FILE == $this->method) {
00408             $fname = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . urlencode($id);
00409             if (false === $data) {
00410                 return unlink($fname);
00411             }
00412             $temp = serialize(array (
00413                     'ttl' => ($ttl > 0 ? time() + $ttl : 0),
00414                     'data' => $data
00415             ));
00416             return file_put_contents($fname, $temp);
00417         }
00418 
00419         if (self :: CM_EACC == $this->method) {
00420             if (false === $data) {
00421                 return eaccelerator_rm($id);
00422             }
00423             return eaccelerator_put($id, serialize($data), $ttl);
00424         }
00425 
00426         throw new Exception('cacheUtil: unknown cache-method used');
00427     }
00428 
00429     /**
00430      * write only data to the cache if item is nonexistant or expired
00431      *
00432      * @param string $id  an unique-id of the data you want to write
00433      * @param mixed $data data to write
00434      * @param int $ttl time to live in seconds
00435      * @param int $forceMethod which caching method to use (only this time)
00436      * @return boolean true on success
00437      */
00438     protected function _add($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00439         $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00440 
00441         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00442             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00443         } else {
00444             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00445         }
00446 
00447         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00448             $this->initMemcached(true);
00449             return $this->memcachedClass->add($id, $data, $ttl);
00450         }
00451 
00452         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00453             $this->initMemcached();
00454             return $this->memcachedClass->add($id, $data, false, $ttl);
00455         }
00456 
00457         if (self :: CM_APC == $this->method) {
00458             return apc_add($id, $data, $ttl);
00459         }
00460 
00461         if (self :: CM_XCACHE == $this->method) {
00462             if (!xcache_isset($id)) {
00463                 return xcache_set($id, $data, $ttl);
00464             }
00465             return false;
00466         }
00467 
00468         if (self :: CM_FILE == $this->method) {
00469             $fname = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . urlencode($id);
00470             if (file_exists($fname)) {
00471                 return false;
00472             }
00473 
00474             // file not expired?
00475             $temp = file_get_contents($fname);
00476             if ($temp !== false) {
00477                 $temp = unserialize($temp);
00478                 if (($temp['ttl'] > 0) && ($temp['ttl'] < time())) {
00479                     return false;
00480                 }
00481             }
00482 
00483             $temp = serialize(array (
00484                     'ttl' => ($ttl > 0 ? time() + $ttl : 0),
00485                     'data' => $data
00486             ));
00487             return file_put_contents($fname, $temp);
00488         }
00489 
00490         if (self :: CM_EACC == $this->method) {
00491             if (null !== eaccelerator_get($id)) {
00492                 return false;
00493             }
00494             return eaccelerator_put($id, $data, $ttl);
00495         }
00496 
00497         throw new Exception('cacheUtil: unknown cache-method used');
00498     }
